FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a RIPng process.
The undo description command deletes the description of a RIPng process.
By default, no description is configured for a RIPng process.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a RIPng process.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-ripng-100] description this process configure the poison reverse process
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A description of a RIPng process helps you identify the RIPng process and understand the configurations easily.
Precautions
If the description command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
